response.overview: Sveini (Svein André Olsen) has dropped out of education and is betting everything on a career as a guitarist in the local band FilibombomBoys. But when the band's frontman Ole Alexander (Ole Alexander Mæland) is offered a solo contract and collaboration with the country's biggest rock star Jølle Giertsen (Kjell Undheim), Sveini and his childhood friends in the band are suddenly on the brink. Sveini sees no other way out than to start a new band to take up the fight against Ole Alexander. Together with bassist James (James Levett) and drummer Roy (Kjetil Haaland), Sveini takes unconventional steps to find his way from the streets back to the limelight. But how far is he willing to go to be able to stand on the biggest stage?
response.title: Supernova
